name: Power Mochi

trigger.text: Draw 1 card. Look at up to 1 card from the top of your or your opponent's Life area and place it at the top or bottom of the Life area.

text: Counter: Look at up to 1 card from the top of your or your opponent's Life area and place it at the top or bottom of the Life area. Then, up to 1 of your Leader or Characters gains +2000 Power during this battle.
